summary: This is an email forwarding a news article from NBC News about a new accuser of Jeffrey Epstein. The article reports that a woman claims Epstein raped her when she was 15 after she was recruited outside her New York City high school to provide sexual massages.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The wealthy financier who is the subject of the NBC News article, accused of raping a 15-year-old girl.

events.title: New Accuser Comes Forward
events.description: A new accuser claims Jeffrey Epstein raped her when she was 15 years old after she was recruited outside her New York City high school to provide sexual massages.

events.title: NBC News Article Publication
events.description: NBC News publishes an article detailing allegations from a new accuser of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A new accuser of Jeffrey Epstein came forward in July 2019, claiming he raped her when she was 15.
The accuser alleges she was recruited outside her New York City high school to provide sexual massages to Epstein.
The information was disseminated via an email forwarding an NBC News article, indicating ongoing media and potentially internal interest in new allegations against Epstein.
